name: Rampix Modpack
body:
# Hello.
This website hosts all the Modpacks for the [Rampix Modpack](http://www.technicpack.net/modpack/details/rampix.100466) on [Technic](http://www.technicpack.net).


## About the Rampix Modpack
Rampix is a modpack created for older computers without a dedicated graphics card. Optifine makes it able to run the newer mods (see below) without any FPS lag.

- Forge
- Forestry
- Thaumcraft3
- Optifine
- EE3
- Modular Powersuit
- NEI
- IC2
- Portal Gun
- Zan's Minimap
- Anti-Griefing
- BuildCraft
- TreeCapitator
- Inventory Tweaks

_Running on Minecraft Version 1.5.1_

## All versions
**Platform url**: http://www.technicpack.net/api/modpack/rampix

Client files: [[download](rampix.github.io/files/15 - Inventory Tweaks/15 - Inventory Tweaks.zip)]
Server files: [[download](rampix.github.io/files/14%20-%20TreeCapitator/14%20-%20rampix_server.zip)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
